definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Field observations were carried out at dozens of crosswalks in Xi an.
sentences.chinese: 在西安市選取了數十條人行橫道進行實地觀測。

sentences.english: The transducing levelling instrument can be used for automatic observation on deformation.
sentences.chinese: 傳感水準器可在自動化觀測變形中應用。

sentences.english: “We don’t observe more mergers in the AGN host galaxies,” Cisternas said.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有觀測更多AGN母星系的吞併。

sentences.english: In space exploration and Earth observation, you have capabilities around the world.
sentences.chinese: 在空間探索和地球觀測方面，你可集合全世界力量。

sentences.english: EH4 electromagnetic system requires distant observation.
sentences.chinese: EH4電磁系統要求在“遠區”觀測。

sentences.english: Power law probability distributions of multiscale auroral dynamics from ground - based TV observations.
sentences.chinese: 根據陸基TV觀測多尺度極光動力學的冪律概率分佈。

sentences.english: In ground experiments, buoyancy influence impedes the understanding on combustion phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 在地面實驗中觀測到的燃燒現象，包含了浮力的影響。

sentences.english: It is the best to observe this eclipse at locations not obscured to the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 最佳觀測地點爲西南面沒有阻擋的場地。

sentences.english: When the observed seismic data have noise background, these methods are effective.
sentences.chinese: 在處理存在干擾背景的地震觀測資料時是有效的。

sentences.english: There are an abundance of the lunar occultation records in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 我國古代有相當豐富的月掩星觀測記錄。

sentences.english: This may explain the IR observations.
sentences.chinese: 這可以解釋觀測到的紅外輻射現象。

sentences.english: The effect of cellular adherent was a major condition for analysis.
sentences.chinese: 而且細胞的貼壁效果也是觀測分析的關鍵條件之一。

sentences.english: The intertubercular sulcus was observed on 60 specimen of humerus.
sentences.chinese: 並在60例骨性標本上，對結節間溝進行觀測。

sentences.english: Neutrons and X rays are observed using gas-discharge.
sentences.chinese: 使用氣體放電法觀測到了中子和X射線。

sentences.english: Usually need to survey deformation of bridge pier in construction process.
sentences.chinese: 在橋樑施工過程中經常需要對橋樑墩臺進行沉降觀測。

sentences.english: Observers under dark skies could see up to 20 meteors per hour.
sentences.chinese: 暗夜裏的觀測者每小時最多可見到20顆流星。

definition: to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to contrast/to compare/to place side by side for comparison (as parallel texts)/to check
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
